Articles.Content:
If I close KSP and start the game again my spaceprobes, lunar bases and those things not saved, I though it was possible in ksp 0.14.

Ps: Sorry for my English, I come from Holland.

> 
> If I close KSP and start the game again my spaceprobes, lunar bases and those things not saved, I though it was possible in ksp 0.14.
> 
> Ps: Sorry for my English, I come from Holland.

Normally there should be autosaves with persistence, but if what you\'re talking about is a save that you can come back to as a checkpoint, there\'s the Quicksave (F5), and to load the quicksave is F9 I think..

That\'s all I can say o\_o.

What kevinlacht said for quicksave/load. Additionally, make sure to choose tracking station or the like when you leave a probe, rather than End Flight. (I know that I\'ve lost a few missions that way. >\_>)

It is also important where did you copy the game\'s folder, because KSP doesn\'t have permission to make a savegame file in some places. You should copy it to C:\ or to another drive, or else the game might won\'t save.
